question: Ashok Leyland has signed an agreement with which bank for vehicle financing?
explanation: Ashok Leyland has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with ICICI Bank. The MoU aims to enter into a strategic financing partnership for two years.  The agreement between the company and the bank will enable both the partners to offer customised financial solutions to customers across India with a focus on semi-urban and rural geographies. The MoU will allow both the organizations to leverage their strengths for the mutual benefit of the customers It will provide more impetus to the commercial vehicle sector as Ashok Leyland is to introduce technology-led and speedy credit and other financial solutions to the fleet owners of trucks and buses. It will also assist them in the growth of their business.
